ygData.subject: RE: Why aqualungs will be totally useless UNLESS.. .
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually think that aqualungs would be viable if they were in the 50 plat range instead of the 225 plat range.  Inevitably, all tinkered items are simply
ygData.messageBody:
I actually think that aqualungs would be viable if they were in the 50 plat
range instead of the 225 plat range.� Inevitably, all tinkered items are
simply not worth the cost.� The same goes for a number of other trade
skills, especially jewelery (and they've rubbed it in by making plat
jewelery never trivial).� I suppose it's nice for folks that have money to
burn and nothing better to do.

-----Original Message-----
From: ms277017@... [mailto:ms277017@...]



They take away the charges... My main char is a druid and I can tell you I
can get about 40 fish scales in about 10 minutes, plus I hear magicians will
be able to summon water stones, so what is the point of having a aqua lung?
until I see evidence otherwise (the rebreather upgrade eliminating the
charges), this is just another bite in the ass for tinkering, Just like the
5 charges on stalking probes, now who would wanna buy an item with 5
charges? nobody. the spyglass is the only decent item that tinkers can make
and even then its not so great, its only good for going to OOT and scoping
out the other islands (to check if sentry xyrin is there). I am also a
smith, so I know what you guys are going through, the items we make we cant
even GIVE away, much less try to sell to make any profit.
�
Lvythn
Druid of Veeshan
